Blog.post: I met you at the club that night around was spinning records and my heart said hey now hey now hey now hey now yaaaow you said you were pleased to meet me through the sweet smell of your perfume blew me away now away now away now away now yaaaow later on that week we went out, talked under the stars until the next day now day now day now day now yaaaow you drank your fruitopia and we never ran out of things to say now say now say now say now yaaow any minute im not with you i hope ill see you soon theres just something that happens when you walk into the room and instantly i feel so complete it hits me right about the time you kiss my cheek and you give me this feeling its like no other feeling but it knocks me off my feet please dont ask me what i like about you cause its every little thing you do and thats just the way you make me feel and i dont think that there are any others out there like you and i wont blink cause that would mean i would miss a second beside you and maybe you know what i mean or maybe this is just a dream i pinch myself just to make sure but im still here and there you are i wonder why we just met now it just kind of happened somehow but here we are together and thats all that matters in the end and instantly i feel so complete it hits me right about the time you kiss my cheek and you give me this feeling its like no other feeling but it knocks me off my feet please dont ask me what i like about you cause its every little thing you do and thats just the way you make me feel you can never ask for too much cause id travel the world just to feel your touch thats just the way you make me feel
I'm tired and bored........
I don't know what color Devan's eyes are........

I really wish that people were not so dramatic , Am I really nieve well honestly I don't think I am. One person told me I was nieve when it came 2 boys, because I don't know when they check me out or hit on me . I think if u think that people are checking u out or hitting on u that u are kinda vain and stuck on yourself. I really don't care if any guy looks at me as long as I marry Devan. Andrew got the same car as Devan that is not cool. All I could think of last night was Devan it was weird I havnt felt like that in a while , oh well. I really dont want 2 start school cause I know it is going 2 be a walking Hell cause their is no one that I can really trust there. And I could say some other things but I will write those in my real journal. maybe

I feal like I have lost the people that meen so much 2 me, like Devan , Andrew , Kayla.... and I juat feal as if I dont belong like i'm the little immature girl that everyone just push's around and is their friend only when they want 2 be friends. Everyone say's that I am nieve but I just enjoy life I want 2 enjoy highschool not make it a sope opra argh!!!!!!!!!!. I will spill more 2morrow

Fumbling his confidence And wondering why the world has passed him by Hoping that he's bid for more than arguments And failed attempts to fly, fly [Chorus] We were meant to live for so much more Have we lost ourselves? Somewhere we live inside Somewhere we live inside We were meant to live for so much more Have we lost ourselves? Somewhere we live inside Dreaming about Providence And whether mice or men have second tries Maybe we've been livin with our eyes half open Maybe we're bent and broken, broken [Chorus] We want more than this world's got to offer We want more than this world's got to offer We want more than the wars of our fathers And everything inside screams for second life, yeah We were meant to live for so much more Have we lost ourselves? We were meant to live for so much more Have we lost ourselves? We were meant to live for so much more Have we lost ourselves? We were meant to live We were meant to live
why do people want to hurt little kids it makes me so sad who in their right mind could do that. It just breaks my heart ARGH!!!!!!!!!!! IT MAKES ME SO MAD

I feel really bad 4 Aaron I know he tries really hard , I wish their was something I could do but I really don't want to get involved w/ him again soo I guess all I can do is pray 4 him. IthinkI am finally over Devan , well I still have feelings4 him and probably allways will but it doesn't hurt to talk to him or be around him anymoreinfact I really like just being friends w/ him. But I cant help feeling that he doesn't want 2 befriends w/ me like I feel like I am bothering him. I think if I was he would show it or tell me. But I think if I was bugging him he wouldn't have asked me 2 go 2 his basketball games so hopefully someday we will be something more than friends again.
My Dad went to the hospital again today and he might have to have surgery and it really worries me......................
If you can will you please pray 4 my Dad

I am feeding my baby brother , I wish i could just freeze him so he would stay a baby forever. S ame w/my other lil sis Grace( i have 3 lil bro's and3 lil sis's) she is so cute and sweet I wish I could just freeze them so they stay little forever.................it's not fair!!!!

I'm quite bored but like not really bored. That doesnt make sense , oh well . Well boy's are smelly so try our lip jelly...... My Dad still isnt fealing much better he can barely walk. Why are some teens so dramatic it really makes me sick , we are kids and I think we should act like we are but some of them just act like theirlife is falling apart(can you guess who) . I'm soooo not going to be like that(and if I do Katie just hit me) I'm going to have as much fun I can while I'm young.
I PAST MY BLACK BELT TEST IM SOOOOOOOOOOOOOO HAPPY.................................

I am maitanence testing 4 my black belt today and i'm freakin out . I Angela feal like I have failed as a best friend I think I excluded Katie and I feal real bad and I didnt go boaTing w/ her now she isnt gonna like me anymore and if she isnt my besty friend the only person I could tell stuff to is God and he doesnt talk back. ps............. pray for me
I'm back from camp. It was awsome and Andrea doesnt like clothes

Why are wont anyone tell me whats goin on , somthing is being talked about that concerns me and I REALLY want 2 know what it is , John said if I knew it would make me stressed, the only thing that makes me stressed is schoolwork. GOSH!!!!!!!!!!!!! now Jon is questioning me(on im) about David and Cory and he asked me if they asked me 2 dinner witch one would I go w/ , obviosly they all know somthin I dont , but of course you all know acording 2 J. I am nieve

I just got back from jess's party it was pretty fun , Cory put a live frog in his mouth. David is very upset and it makes me so mad that J. did that cause I know it was just 2 get Aaron jealouse argh!!!!!!!!!!!!! she makes me so mad. And of couse billy and hails are woop di du and I'm left w/ nothin but my Besty friend Katie..........................

I feal like I'm gonna cry, I think its just cause I'm tired . But I just am fealing upset and scared but as I said I think its just cuase I'm tired. I HAVE A SUNBURN on my face and my back and IT HURTS........................ Katie where the heck are ya

oh my goodness I am so tired . Our family the Richards and the Olsens went 2 the lake and I swam the whole time and now I am wiped. Ya know what is Kinda gross is the 3 oldest Richard boys have either flirted w/ me or liked me , that is very odd......

I'm a nutcase or am I a casenut who knows.................... I'm really tired and sweaty I just got back from TaeKwonDo it was a very good class , I have 2 teach class next week and I'm kinda like freekin out......................Devan talked 2 me last night and he said guy's like him like girls like me( like nieve one's) and that made me very happy.................oh yes ....................................very happy.....................

They changed Blues clues. She is now a puppet not a cartoon and she doesnt have a handy dandy notebook she has a stupid journal...................aaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh this makes me so mad no more Mr Salt and Mrs Pepper and slippery soap waaaa...........waaaaaa

Fealings inside my head are sending me 4 a loop. I feal really odd like somthing is missing like a part of me has been ripped away. I was thinking this morning in church like about stuff that has happened in the last year and I guess I'm just scared of school starting cause I know it's gonna be hard. But I just get this weird fealing around some people.........
I feal real funny I dont know why like this morning in church I got a weird vibe from some people. I feal like I am being watched by some 1 its weird.....oh I just broke a nail
